meta.name: Project Multi-level Index System
meta.description: Use this skill to maintain the fractal self-referential documentation system when users request "initialize index", "update documentation", "generate dependency graph", or when structural file changes are detected

coreIdea.title: Core Concept
coreIdea.subtitle: A fractal documentation system inspired by Gödel, Escher, Bach:
principles: **Self-similarity**: Each level (project→folder→file) has the same index structure
**Self-reference**: Each document declares "update me when I change"
**Polyphony**: Code and documentation echo each other, local affects global, global affects local

excludePatterns.directories: node_modules, .git, dist, build, .next, target, vendor, __pycache__, .cache, coverage, .turbo, .venv, venv, pnpm-store, .yarn
